thread.title: Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of June 2015
thread.title_full: Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of June 2015

title: Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of June 2015
text:
Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of June 2015 By PR Newswire | 07/08/15 - 04:27 PM EDT ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. , July 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Squaremouth , America's fastest growing travel insurance comparison site, announced their top-selling travel insurance providers of June 2015 . Top-Selling Travel Insurance Providers for June 2015 , Ranked by Premium Sold: 1 - Tin Leg - $284,214.00 2 - AXA Assistance USA - $199,624.00 3 - InsureandGo USA - $159,944.56 4 - Travel Insured International - $124,260.00 5 - CSA Travel Protection - $104,980.73 Tin Leg Number of policies sold in June 2015 : 1,006 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 19,304 Overall customer rating: 4.37 out of 5 Percent of negative reviews to sales: 0.3% AXA Assistance USA Number of policies sold in June 2015 : 447 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 551 Overall customer rating: 4.47 out of 5 Percent of negative reviews to sales: 0.0% InsureandGo USA Number of policies sold in June 2015 : 989 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 3,398 Overall customer rating: 4.72 out of 5 Percent of negative reviews to sales: 0.0% Travel Insured International Number of policies sold in June 2015 : 562 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 45,363 Overall customer rating: 4.44 out of 5 Percent of negative reviews to sales: 0.7% CSA Travel Protection Number of policies sold in June 2015 : 405 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 44,587 Overall customer rating: 4.44 out of 5 Percent of negative reviews to sales: 0.7% ABOUT SQUAREMOUTH: Squaremouth is an online company that compares travel insurance products from virtually every major travel insurance provider in the United States . Using Squaremouth's comparison engine and third party customer reviews, travelers can research and compare insurance products side-by-side. More information can be found at www.squaremouth. com . AVAILABLE TOPIC EXPERT : Megan Singh msingh@squaremouth.com (727) 378-0983 To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/squaremouth-announces-the-top-travel-insurance-providers-of-june-2015-300110481.html SOURCE Squaremouth Copyright 2011 PR Newswire.
